name: Lily (itch)
description:
Lily is a narrative puzzle game. Lily is a teenager with schizophrenia and she discovers the symptoms. 

This experience shows her view of the world and how she interacts with. It focuses on Lily, her emotions, her feelings and her memories.

Voice acting is in French, sorry to our non-French speaking players.

Lily is a 3 month student project started on March 20th and ended on June 5th, in the context of a video game  master degree (Master JMIN at CNAM ENJMIN in France).
